message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a blockchain-based system for securing IoT devices.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the paper discusses the challenge of determining the correct behavior for an IoT device and proposes a collaborative approach for building whitelists of observed behavior.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is relevant as the paper focuses on network traffic whitelisting for IoT devices.
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is relevant as the paper proposes a distributed system for building and enforcing security policies.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is less likely but still relevant as the paper discusses the performance and scalability of the proposed system.
